channel.title: Comments on: Mac OS: How To Set A Lock Screen Message

item.title: By: josephscott
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2018/07/31/mac-os-how-to-set-a-lock-screen-message/#comment-122260">Lance Willett</a>.
In the past I've used a label maker to put contact info on the bottom of a laptop.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Lance Willett.

In the past I’ve used a label maker to put contact info on the bottom of a laptop.

item.title: By: Lance Willett
item.dc:creator: Lance Willett
item.description:
Great tip.
My usual technique is low-tech: I tape a business card to the bottom of the laptop. Bonus point for the airport security line and quick visual.
item.content:encoded:
Great tip.

My usual technique is low-tech: I tape a business card to the bottom of the laptop. Bonus point for the airport security line and quick visual.
